type.description: The type of the level entry.
A single level to be played.

level.description: A level ID to be loaded and played.

unlockCheckpointsOnBeat.description: If specified, after beating this entry, checkpoints with IDs corresponding to numbers in this list will be unlocked.

items.description: A single checkpoint to be unlocked after this entry has been completed.

type.description: A group of levels to be played in random order.

pool.description: A list of level IDs to be chosen from.

names.description: A list of level names. It is not shuffled, and this list should have the same length as the count field.
names.markdownDescription: A list of level names. It is not shuffled, and this list should have the same length as the `count` field.

count.description: How many levels are to be picked from the pool.

mode.description: How the levels will be randomized.

oneOf.description: Every next level is simply drawn at random from the list.
Same as above, but an entry is removed from the pool once it's been picked. Requires the pool size to be greater or equal to the count field.
oneOf.markdownDescription: Same as above, but an entry is removed from the pool once it's been picked. Requires the pool size to be greater or equal to the `count` field.

oneOf.description: Chooses entries from the pool at random without changing their order. Requires the pool size to be greater or equal to the count field.
oneOf.markdownDescription: Chooses entries from the pool at random without changing their order. Requires the pool size to be greater or equal to the `count` field.

unlockCheckpointsOnBeat.description: If specified, after beating this entry, checkpoints with IDs corresponding to numbers in this list will be unlocked.

items.description: A single checkpoint to be unlocked after this entry has been completed.
